Wholesale Marketing Network

Ever find Listings or Retail properties while you are marketing for your distressed homes?


Don't let those marketing dollars go to waste and get paid a marketing fee from us!


Send us your client and we will list the property for them, you'll be notified of the process, and get paid when it closes!

Benefits of our Wholesale Marketing Network

Get Notified through-out the whole process.

Get paid for your marketing when we close.

Make it even easier and you can partner with us directly through your CRM.
